refnamediv.refpurpose: Return a pointer to an integer to access data stored at a given position in the Scilab memory

listitem.para: the position in the Scilab memory of the parameter to be accessed (input argument)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This C gateway function returns a pointer to an integer to access data stored at a given position in the Scilab memory.
WARNING: This API is deprecated from Scilab 5.2.0 and is going to be removed with Scilab 6.0. Please use API Scilab (the new Scilab API).
